job.title: QA Software Engineer/SDET (Rochester)
job.description: Dematic is an intralogistics innovator that designs builds and supports intelligent automated solutions for manufacturing warehouse and distribution environments for customers that are powering the future of commerce With engineering centers manufacturing facilities and service centers located in more than 25 countries the Dematic global network of 10000 employees has helped achieve more than 6000 worldwide customer installations for some of the worlds leading brands Headquartered in Atlanta Dematic is a member of KION Group one of the global leaders in industrial trucks and supply chain solutions and a leading provider of warehouse automationbrbrstrong The Role brbrstrongstronguCapabilitiesbrustrongulli Demonstrate an understanding of industrystandard software Quality Assurance methodologies tools and processeslili Possess knowledge of Warehouse Controls Warehouse Management or Warehouse Execution Software and operational processeslili Experience with Object Oriented Programming languages C or Java and SOLID design principles lili Experience with Git or other distributed version control systems lili Exposure to Continuous Integration  Continuous Deployment practices lili Experience on working with various Operating Systems lili Familiar with Agile methodology lili Setting up productionlike environment in local environment and also be able to deploy artifacts lili Design and develop test suites with Java Selenium TestNG framwork lili Experience in testing web services such as REST and SOAP lili Familiarity with build tools such as Ant Maven lili Experience in using test management tools like Testrail lili Experience in any bug tracking or issue tracking tool like JIRA lili Understand database structure and how to retrieve information using MYSQL or SQLServerlili Understand Customer business requirements to foresee potential issues provide input on functional requirements and advise on designlili Define and execute test scripts evaluate results against predicted outcomeslili Have the ability to effectively communicate risks for mitigation and defects for swift resolutionlili Participate in and eventually lead onsite testing of software with related distribution center functional groups and mechatronicslili Participate in and lead Customer enduser training as related to the standard operating of the software testedlili Support Dematics Customer Service center with troubleshooting root cause to expedite resolutionlili Be willing to take ownership of testing excellence for optimal project executionbrliultionbrbrstronguExperience And Educationbrbrustrongstrong What We Are Looking For brbrstrongThe ideal SDET will have the following education certifications and experiencebrulli Masters
